personalStatement: Just love to learn new things -- web & mobile app development, machine learning, natural language processing, IoT, problem solving, and more.

Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering

work.company: Natural Language Understanding Lab (Prof. Keh-Yih Su), Academia Sinica
work.description: Designed and implemented a GAN model for paraphrase generation in PyTorch and demonstrated its ability to capture some core paraphrasing techniques through experiments. Awarded the Best Intern Project and Best Paper Presentation.
highlights: GAN, PyTorch

work.description: Built a frontend interface for data visualization and searching of customer data. Trained on server-side & DevOps programming
highlights: Flask, React.js, Redux, AWS, Chef (DevOps)

work.description: Built an iOS app to display air pollution data in Hong Kong, combined with personal health information to provide traffic route advice
highlights: React Native, Redux, Google Map API

work.description: Built a live streaming app for Yahoo! Auction in 2 months using React Native, in a team of 2 engineers and 1 designer
highlights: Managed to learn React Native & Redux from zero knowledge to being able to fully assist in deploying an app
Technical components include React Native, Redux, WebRTC, Firebase, OAuth 2

work.description: Troubleshooting and queries answering in the lab, with over 120 students
highlights: Firm knowledge in circuit theory & lab equipment operation
Ability to come up with solutions efficiently when facing problems or failures

voluntary.title: E-Book Writer
voluntary.description: Compose & review Python related technical articles once a month
highlights: Mainly in charge of Machine Learning & Natural Language Processing

voluntary.title: English Teaching
voluntary.description: English course design and teaching, targeted on grade nine and university students
highlights: Ability to convey complicated ideas to others in a compact and simplified form
Ability to design creative course material

competition.title: Microsoft ImagineCup
competition.description: Developed an Android App to assist users with emotion management. Won the 1st place in Microsoft ImaginHack with over 20 groups of participants. Reached top 8 in Microsoft ImagineCup
highlights: Developed in React Native; used Microsoft Emotion API to detect user’s facial emotions in real time
Developed a mechanism to detect end of talks (using comparison with background noise amplitudes)

competition.title: UBS Group Technology Case Study Challenge
competition.description: Developed a plan to improve client experience using technology, in a team of 3
highlights: Technically independent on implementing a simple FB BOT on AWS
Team collaboration on idea forming
Technical components include NodeJS, AWS deployment, Firebase, FB API

competition.title: ACM Hong Kong Chapter
competition.description: 3rd runner-up team competing with over 30 teams from universities of Hong Kong and Macau, with a team of 3
highlights: Problem solving & team collaboration

competition.title: Project Competition
competition.description: Building a Rube Goldberg Machine; 3rd place out of 30 teams with 5 members each
highlights: Ability to collaborate with people from a diversity of backgrounds
Leadership & communication ability
Project management skills
Practical circuit design & building skills

extracurricular.description: Course preparations, teaching, course book writing & editing
